Class MenuItemController

java.lang.Object
com.pekings.pos.controller.MenuItemController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/menuitem") public class MenuItemController extends Object
REST Controller for managing Menu Item-related operations. Provides endpoints for CRUD operations, retrieving menu item details, and analytics on menu items.

      public MenuItemController()

  • Method Details

    • getAllMenuItems

      @GetMapping("/all") public List<MenuItem> getAllMenuItems()
      Retrieves all menu items, sorted by their ID.
      Returns:
      A list of all menu items, sorted by ID.

    • getMenuItem

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public MenuItem getMenuItem(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      Retrieves a specific menu item by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the desired menu item.
      Returns:
      The menu item with the given ID, or null if not found.

    • getIngredients

      @GetMapping("/{id}/ingredients") public List<MenuIngredient> getIngredients(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      Retrieves the ingredients associated with a specific menu item.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the menu item.
      Returns:
      A list of ingredients associated with the menu item.

    • getTopMenuItemsPeriodic

      @GetMapping("/top") public List<SaleItem> getTopMenuItemsPeriodic(@RequestParam(value="startDate",required=false) @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) Instant startDate, @RequestParam(value="endDate",required=false) @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) Instant endDate)
      Retrieves the top-selling menu items within a specified time period. Example usage: /api/menuitem/top?startDate=2024-01-01T00:00:00Z&endDate=2024-12-31T23:59:59Z
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date of the period (optional).
      endDate - The end date of the period (optional).
      Returns:
      A list of top-selling menu items within the given timeframe.

    • getMenuItemsCategory

      @GetMapping("/category/{category}") public List<MenuItem> getMenuItemsCategory(@PathVariable("category") String category)
      Retrieves menu items belonging to a specific category.
      Parameters:
      category - The category of menu items to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of menu items in the specified category.

    • addMenuItem

      @PostMapping("/add") public MenuItem addMenuItem(@RequestBody MenuItem menuItem)
      Adds a new menu item to the system.
      Parameters:
      menuItem - The menu item to add, including optional associated ingredients.
      Returns:
      The added menu item after saving to the database.

    • updateMenuItem

      @PatchMapping("/update") public MenuItem updateMenuItem(@RequestBody MenuItem menuItem)
      Updates an existing menu item. Example request body: 
       {
     "id": 46,
     "name": "Sushi Platter",
     "price": 20.00,
     "active": true,
     "category": "seasonal",
     "ingredients": [
         {
             "ingredient": { "id": 5 },
             "amount": 3
         },
         {
             "ingredient": { "id": 6 },
             "amount": 3
         }
     ]
 }
      Parameters:
      menuItem - The updated menu item, which must include a valid ID.
      Returns:
      The updated menu item after saving to the database, or null if the ID is not provided.

    • deleteMenuItem

      @DeleteMapping("/delete") public void deleteMenuItem(@RequestBody int menuItemID)
      Deletes a menu item by its ID.
      Parameters:
      menuItemID - The ID of the menu item to delete.
